titleStmt.title: Astrologia accusata pariter & condemnata. Or The diabolical art of judicial astrologie, receiving the definitive sentence of final condemnation: being delivered in this following discourse, where the said art is briefly and manifestly opened, justly arraigned, diligently examined, and experimentally condemned by him, who was a student in the same. / By John Raunce, sometime a practitioner of astrologie, and student in the magick art.
titleStmt.author: Raunce, John, 17th cent.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Clowes, for W. Learner, at the Blackmore in Bishopsgate-streete,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
